text: "Over You" is a 1980 song by English rock band Roxy Music. It is the leading single from their seventh studio album Flesh and Blood. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 80 in the United States, number 24 in New Zealand and the Netherlands, number 6 in Ireland and number 45 in Australia. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Roxy Music songs
title: Over You (Roxy Music song)
